Translations.Text: Ndarahiye ku Majuru hamwe n’icoza mw’Ijoro
None n’igiki kizo kumenyesha ico kintu kizoza mw’Ijoro
N’Inyenyeri yaka cane
Nta mutima w’Umuntu uwariwe wese atari uko ufise uwuwu cungereye hejuru yiwe
Ahubwo umuntu niyirabe neza, yaremwe mu kintu nyabaki
Yaremwe mumazi asunitswe
Avuye hagati y’amagufa y’umugongo n’igikiriza
Mu vy’ukuri Imana irafise ubushobozi bw’ukumugarura
Umusi hazoserurwa amabanga y’abantu bose
Rero nta bushobozi azoba afise canke umufasha
Ndarahiye kubicu bizana imvura
No kw’Isi isaduka ikazana ibiterwa
Yuko iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu, n’imvugo itandukanya ukuri kwama
Kandi si ibijajuro
Mu vy’ukuri n’abagira ingeso kuzindi
Nanje izo ngeso zabo ndazitereye kure
Nubahe abo bahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri, umwanya mutoyi gusa
Ninahaza izina ry’Umuremyi wawe mutagatifu
Uwaremye ibintu vyose nukubi ringaniza
Nukugerageza kimwe kukindi, nukukirongora
Niya nagishije ivyakatsi vyose
Hanyuma nukuyigira ivyumye n’ibara ryirabura
Tuzo kwigisha kandi ntuzo kwibagira
Mugabo Imana ibishatse niyo ifise ubumenyi bw’ibiboneka hamwe nibita boneka
Natwe tuzo kworohereza idini ryoroshe
Rero nubashikirize ubwo butumwa nibwaba bushoboka
Ntankeka azokwibuka uwutinya Imana yiwe y’ukuri
Uwufise ibihano vyinshi azoba kure y’ubwo butumwa
Uwuzo kwinjira mu muriro udahera muniniya cane
Hanyuma muri uwo muriro udahera ntazopfa canke ntazoba muzima
Mu vy’ukuri aramaze kuronka intsinzi uwisukuye n’amabi
Akibuka izina ry’Umuremyi wiwe n’ugusenga
